trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Lonuhali requires a swift pair of legs for an urgent delivery.
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TODO_00<tab>Distribute the reed dumplings.
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lonuhali.

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_000<tab>Welcome, honored visitor! Thanks to your efforts, the reeds grow robust, and at last I can make reed dumplings again. Oh, they're every bit as delicious as I remember!

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_001<tab>Although I want nothing more than to eat until my belly bursts, I've saved a batch for those who are planning the reconstruction of the great stairs. I'm much too full to make such a journey, however─might you deliver them in my stead?
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_002<tab>Surely my friends will be glad to receive them from the very <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who revitalized Ok'hanu's festive spirit!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_003<tab>Thank you, thank you! They can be found working hard near the Flight of We Wingless. Hurry before the dumplings cool!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_004<tab>The dumplings are cooling as we speak─hurry and take them to my friends at the Flight of We Wingless!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_GANUHALI_000_005<tab>Oh, I recognize you─you travel with Wuk Lamat, yes? Have you come to see our progress on the great stairs?
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_GANUHALI_000_006<tab>Dumplings!? Oh, how long has it been since I last smelled that heavenly aroma...?

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_GANUHALI_000_007<tab>When the reeds sprouted big and tall, we had cause to celebrate often, and it was a common scent in Ok'hanu. To have these delivered by one who helped those days to return is a great honor indeed!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_ZONUHANU_000_008<tab>This project will cause my feathers to fall out one by one, mark my words... Where do we even begin?
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_ZONUHANU_000_009<tab>Lonuhali made her famous dumplings!? These are just what I needed...such a large undertaking makes one so very hungry!

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_ZONUHANU_000_010<tab>With my energies restored, I've come to a realization. Our reed problem required the perspective of visitors to solve, so perhaps we should consult artisans from other clans for advice on how to repair the great stairs.
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TONUHANU_000_011<tab>Ohokaliy! Apologies, but this area is still impassable.
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TONUHANU_000_012<tab>You brought reed dumplings!? Just as I was about to keel over from hunger, a kind soul appears from the wilderness to save me!

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TONUHANU_000_013<tab>This passage is of great importance to us, since no small number of merchants use it to reach Ok'hanu. With delicious dumplings to fuel me, I can now tackle this problem with renewed energy!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_GANUHALI_000_014<tab>It's been too long since there were enough extra reeds to make dumplings. Thank you for reminding me that better times are upon us!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_ZONUHANU_000_015<tab>Your gift has blessed me with a fresh idea. This may be the first step towards finally repairing the great stairs.

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_TONUHANU_000_016<tab>While this area can be reached by water routes, the stairs are a much less strenuous journey for all involved. With hunger no longer a distraction, I hope I can finally solve the problem of their reconstruction.
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_017<tab>Thank you for delivering the dumplings! I hope they give my friends the energy to complete the daunting task ahead of them.

TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_018<tab>Reed dumplings are considered delicacy among the Hanuhanu, and for good reason. I would like nothing more than to make a batch for our other wingless brethren who aid with the rebuilding, but I realize that not all peoples love their flavor as much as we do...
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_019<tab>But that doesn't mean I can't send a different gift to show my appreciation. I intend to send a nice haul of fish their way!
TEXT_KINGZC010_05069_LONUHALI_000_020<tab>You don't seem the type to munch on reeds, either, so I've prepared something else for your reward─cold, hard coin!
